languages.text: "Этот обломок... лишь часть чего-то большего. Чего-то великого, что ныне низведено до трофея на стене мон-кай..." {n}Лицо Ирлиэт на несколько секунд вновь застилает калейдоскоп эмоций, прежде чем она прерывисто вздыхает.{/n}

"This shard... is but a small part of something much larger. Something great... now reduced to a trophy on a mon-keigh's wall..." {n}A kaleidoscope of emotions rages on Yrliet's face for a few moments before she lets out a ragged sigh.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Этот обломок... лишь часть чего-то большего. Чего-то великого, что ныне низведено до трофея на стене мон-кай..." {n}Лицо Ирлиэт на несколько секунд вновь застилает калейдоскоп эмоций, прежде чем она прерывисто вздыхает.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "This shard... is just a small part of something big. Something great that is now relegated to a trophy on a mon-keigh's wall... {n}The emotional kaleidoscope appears on Yrliet's face for a few moments before she sighs abruptly again.{/n}
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

traits.locale_text: "This shard... is but a small part of something much larger. Something great... now reduced to a trophy on a mon-keigh's wall..." {n}A kaleidoscope of emotions rages on Yrliet's face for a few moments before she lets out a ragged sigh.{/n}
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: “这个碎片……曾经是某件伟大作品的一部分。曾经如此壮丽的作品，现在却沦为猴子墙上的战利品……”{n}伊莉耶特的脸上翻涌着千变万化的情绪，她发出一声沉重的叹息。{/n}
languages.original_text: "This shard... is but a small part of something much larger. Something great... now reduced to a trophy on a mon-keigh's wall..." {n}A kaleidoscope of emotions rages on Yrliet's face for a few moments before she lets out a ragged sigh.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “这个碎片……曾经是某件伟大作品的一部分。曾经如此壮丽的作品，现在却沦为猴子墙上的战利品……”{n}伊莉耶特的脸上翻涌着千变万化的情绪，她发出一声沉重的叹息。{/n}
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: «Este fragmento... es una mínima parte de algo mucho mayor. Algo grandioso... que ahora no es más que un simple trofeo en la pared de {mf|un|una} mon-keigh...». {n}Un caleidoscopio de emociones surca el rostro de Yrliet durante un instante, luego deja escapar un suspiro desgarrado.{/n}
languages.original_text: "This shard... is but a small part of something much larger. Something great... now reduced to a trophy on a mon-keigh's wall..." {n}A kaleidoscope of emotions rages on Yrliet's face for a few moments before she lets out a ragged sigh.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «Este fragmento... es una mínima parte de algo mucho mayor. Algo grandioso... que ahora no es más que un simple trofeo en la pared de {mf|un|una} mon-keigh...». {n}Un caleidoscopio de emociones surca el rostro de Yrliet durante un instante, luego deja escapar un suspiro desgarrado.{/n}
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: « Ce fragment... appartient à quelque chose de bien plus grand. Une chose si importante... qui n'est plus qu'un trophée mon-keigh, désormais... » {n}Une myriade d'émotions traverse le visage d'Yrliet, qui pousse finalement un soupir de lassitude.{/n}
languages.original_text: "This shard... is but a small part of something much larger. Something great... now reduced to a trophy on a mon-keigh's wall..." {n}A kaleidoscope of emotions rages on Yrliet's face for a few moments before she lets out a ragged sigh.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « Ce fragment... appartient à quelque chose de bien plus grand. Une chose si importante... qui n'est plus qu'un trophée mon-keigh, désormais... » {n}Une myriade d'émotions traverse le visage d'Yrliet, qui pousse finalement un soupir de lassitude.{/n}
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: "Dieser Splitter ... ist nur ein kleiner Teil von etwas viel Größerem. Etwas Großartigem ... nun reduziert auf eine Trophäe an der Wand eines Chem-Pan-Sey ..." {n}Ein Kaleidoskop von Gefühlen tobt kurz über Yrliets Gesicht, bevor sie tief seufzt.{/n}
languages.original_text: "This shard... is but a small part of something much larger. Something great... now reduced to a trophy on a mon-keigh's wall..." {n}A kaleidoscope of emotions rages on Yrliet's face for a few moments before she lets out a ragged sigh.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Dieser Splitter ... ist nur ein kleiner Teil von etwas viel Größerem. Etwas Großartigem ... nun reduziert auf eine Trophäe an der Wand eines Chem-Pan-Sey ..." {n}Ein Kaleidoskop von Gefühlen tobt kurz über Yrliets Gesicht, bevor sie tief seufzt.{/n}
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: 「この破片は…もっと大きなもののほんの一部にすぎない。何か偉大なもの…今はモン＝ケイの壁に飾られた戦利品に過ぎないがな…」{n}万華鏡のように、様々な感情がユリエットの顔に浮かんだ。しばらくして、彼女は荒く息をついた。{/n}
languages.original_text: "This shard... is but a small part of something much larger. Something great... now reduced to a trophy on a mon-keigh's wall..." {n}A kaleidoscope of emotions rages on Yrliet's face for a few moments before she lets out a ragged sigh.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「この破片は…もっと大きなもののほんの一部にすぎない。何か偉大なもの…今はモン＝ケイの壁に飾られた戦利品に過ぎないがな…」{n}万華鏡のように、様々な感情がユリエットの顔に浮かんだ。しばらくして、彼女は荒く息をついた。{/n}
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: "Bu... Daha büyük, çok ama çok büyük bir şeyin küçük bir parçası. Şimdiyse bir mon-keigh'in duvarında asılı." {n}Yüzünde duygu seli beliren Yrliet, hırıltıyla iç çekiyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: "This shard... is but a small part of something much larger. Something great... now reduced to a trophy on a mon-keigh's wall..." {n}A kaleidoscope of emotions rages on Yrliet's face for a few moments before she lets out a ragged sigh.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Bu parça, daha büyük bir şeyin küçük bir kısmı. Oldukça büyük bir şeyin... Şimdiyse bir mon-keigh'nin duvarında asılı kalakalmış." {n}Yrliet, hırıltılı bir şekilde iç çekmeden önce yüzünde bir duygu seli görünüyor.{/n}
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion
